data.eml:eml: First record of the family Ithonidae (Neuroptera) from Baltic amber

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Makarkin, Vladimir N., Wedmann, Sonja, Weiterschan, Thomas (2014): First record of the family Ithonidae (Neuroptera) from Baltic amber. Zootaxa 3796 (2): 385-393, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3796.2.10
